nodes.text: Return of the Jedi Giant Collector's Compendium: Heroes, Villains, Creatures & Droids
Return of the Jedi Giant Collector's Compendium: Heroes, Villains, Creatures & Droids was published in July 1983 by Paradise Press. The cover price was $2.95.
This magazine included 48 profiles of characters, vehicles and locations from the film Return of the Jedi.
